description.en: The Dance House is a party format where students can experience the compelling atmosphere of a community celebration and experience dancing to live music performed by agile instrumentalists. Each meeting the Dance House format focuses on one dance or board game through a special workshop.
description.et: Tantsumaja on peoformaat, kus on võimalus osa saada külapeo kaasakiskuvast meeleolust koos ärksate pillimeeste ja elava pärimusmuusikaga ehedaks tantsimiseks.Tantsumajas on alati ühe konkreetse tantsu või laulumängu õpituba.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to learn traditional dances in its natural environment with live music by using the method of active participation.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on õppida osalusmeetodil, loomulikus situatsioonis ja keskkonnas pärimustantse elava pillimängu saatel.

learning_outcomes.en: The student after having attended the course can do the following:
- have obtained the basic steps of Estonian dances;
- can differntiate between different dances by melody.

independent_work.et: Osalemine vähemalt 75% tundides. Selgitatakse esimeses praktikumis.

description.et:
